column4: Package libavcodec-extra-52 is not available, but is referred to by another package. -- What package is that?
this is a message I get from Aptitude
you have extra repos enabled? ive seen similer issues if i use medibuntu or some 3rd party repos that have differnt verisons of the libavcodec
yeah I have a Lucid one enabled in Oneric for Skype
